data.actual_result: Part of the edited stamp is cut off, leaving the rest being wrapped.
data.expected_result: Edited stamp should be wrapped normal
data.short_description: Edited time stamp is wrapped like normal text
data.steps_to_repro: - Copy the separation line from Bug Bot's report - Paste it in a text channel then edit something ABOVE the line - Pin the message to the channel - Check the pinned messages and observe
